answer.text: You can cancel an order until it has been packed at our warehouse through our Website, Mobile Site or App. This includes items purchased on sale also. Any amount paid will be credited into the same payment mode using which the payment was made.

You can use any one of the following payment methods:
Credit card
Debit card
Wallets
You can other modes of payment through our Website or Mobile App.
If your payment is failed but the money is deducted from your account, don't worry! It will be reversed instantly. You can check your account balance to confirm.

answer.text: If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply return the item or items to us in their original condition within 14 days of receipt. We will issue a full refund or exchange the item for a different size / colour if preferred.

*Please Note*:
 
1. We cannot accept returns or exchanges of items that have been washed or soiled.
2. We cannot accept any items covered in human or pet hair.
3. We cannot accept any items with distinct odours.
4. If an item is no longer sold on our website it cannot be returned for an exchange or
refund.

faqs.question: Where should I self-ship the Returns?

alternateQuestions.question: self ship address
terms: Return and Exchange|| || /exchange/return/return & exchange/return policy/exchange policy
Return and Exchange|| || /exchange/return/return & exchange/return policy/exchange policy

answer.text:
You can send the return to any one of the returns processing facilities depending on your location. Kindly do not send it to on any other address as the package would not be acceptable then. Please address the return shipments to the seller you purchased the products from, details of which can be found on your order invoice.
Refer to the website for return facilities near your location.

faqs.question: Here's how you can avail offers

answer.text:
We are running offers on Appliances which can be availed using promo codes on Website and Mobile App.

Here are the steps to use a promo code:
1. Choose your item and proceed to payment.
2. Enter the code on the 'Review Order' page on the website or the 'Payment' page on our app.
Discount will be applied immediately

alternateQuestions.question: What all brands are you associated with?

answer.text:
We understand shopper's needs and cater to them with choice of Appliances and Gadgets from leading brands listed on our website. 
You can also shop from recently introduced labels with us.

faqs.question: Why are there different prices for the same product? Is it legal?

alternateQuestions.question: Why do you have different prices for same products?

answer.text: We are an online platform who enable independent sellers to sell their products to buyers. The prices are solely decided by the sellers, and we do not interfere in the same. There could be a possibility that the same product is sold by different sellers at different prices. We rightfully fulfil all legal compliances of onboarding multiple sellers on its forum as it is a marketplace platform.

Welcome! Your number one source for all things - Home Appliances and Gadgets. We're dedicated to providing you the very best, with an emphasis on quality, warranty and easy delivery.

Founded in 2019, we have come a long way from its beginnings. 

We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us.

alternateQuestions.question: I want to ask few questions

answer.text:
For any other queries, follow these steps on the Website or Mobile App:
1. Go to 'My orders'
2. Open the relevant order.
3. Click on 'Need Help' Or 'Report problem with order'.
4. Select your issue from the dropdown & submit it

And our team will get back to you through Email or SMS or call

answer.text:
Kami memahami kebutuhan pembeli dan melayani mereka dengan pilihan Peralatan dan Gadget dari merek-merek terkemuka yang terdaftar di situs web kami.
Anda juga dapat berbelanja dari label yang baru diperkenalkan dengan kami.

alternateQuestions.question: Bagaimana saya bisa mengembalikan atau menukar pesanan saya?
terms: Kembali dan Tukar|| || /exchange/exchange policy/return/return & exchange/return policy
Kembali dan Tukar|| || /exchange/exchange policy/return/return & exchange/return policy

answer.text: Jika Anda tidak sepenuhnya puas dengan pembelian Anda, cukup kembalikan barang atau barang tersebut kepada kami dalam kondisi aslinya dalam waktu 14 hari setelah diterima. Kami akan mengeluarkan pengembalian dana penuh atau menukar barang dengan ukuran / warna yang berbeda jika diinginkan.

*Harap Dicatat*: 
 
1. Kami tidak dapat menerima pengembalian atau pertukaran barang yang telah dicuci atau kotor. 
2. Kami tidak dapat menerima barang apa pun yang tercakup dalam rambut manusia atau hewan peliharaan. 
3. Kami tidak dapat menerima barang apa pun dengan bau yang berbeda. 
4. Jika suatu barang tidak lagi dijual di situs web kami, barang itu tidak dapat dikembalikan untuk ditukar atau dikembalikan.

Selamat datang! Sumber nomor satu Anda untuk semua hal - Peralatan Rumah Tangga dan Gadget. Kami berdedikasi untuk memberikan yang terbaik kepada Anda, dengan penekanan pada kualitas, garansi, dan pengiriman yang mudah.

Didirikan pada tahun 2019, kami telah menempuh jalan yang sangat jauh sejak awal.

Kami harap Anda menikmati produk kami seperti halnya kami senang menawarkannya kepada Anda. Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau komentar, jangan ragu untuk menghubungi kami.

Anda dapat menggunakan salah satu metode pembayaran berikut:
Kartu kredit
Kartu debit
Dompet
Anda dapat menggunakan cara pembayaran lain melalui Situs Web atau Aplikasi Seluler kami.
Jika pembayaran Anda gagal tetapi uang itu dikurangkan dari akun Anda, jangan khawatir! Ini akan terbalik secara instan. Anda dapat memeriksa saldo akun Anda untuk mengonfirmasi.

alternateQuestions.question: Tunjukkan pada saya kebijakan pembatalan Anda

answer.text: Anda dapat membatalkan pesanan sampai telah dikemas di gudang kami melalui Situs Web, Situs Mobile atau Aplikasi kami. Ini termasuk barang yang dibeli dijual juga. Jumlah berapa pun yang dibayarkan akan dikreditkan ke dalam mode pembayaran yang sama dengan menggunakan pembayaran yang dilakukan.

faqs.question: Inilah cara Anda dapat memanfaatkan penawaran

answer.text:
Kami menjalankan penawaran pada Peralatan yang dapat dicairkan menggunakan kode promo di Situs Web dan Aplikasi Seluler.

Berikut adalah langkah-langkah untuk menggunakan kode promo:
1. Pilih item Anda dan lanjutkan ke pembayaran.
2. Masukkan kode pada halaman 'Periksa Pesanan' di situs web atau halaman 'Pembayaran' di aplikasi kami.
Diskon akan diterapkan segera

alternateQuestions.question: Bantuan tentang pertanyaan Anda yang lain

answer.text:
Untuk pertanyaan lain, ikuti langkah-langkah ini di Situs Web atau Aplikasi Seluler: 
1. Buka 'Pesanan saya' 
2. Buka pesanan yang relevan. 
3. Klik 'Butuh Bantuan' Atau 'Laporkan masalah dengan pesanan'. 
4. Pilih masalah Anda dari tarik-turun & kirim itu 
 
Dan tim kami akan menghubungi Anda melalui Email atau SMS atau panggilan
